Workload_Description: AI-powered Synthetic Engineers for industrial plant intelligence.
Workload_Hub_Slogan: PhD-level AI Engineers for your industrial operations.
Workload_Hub_Description:
IntuigenceAI brings AI-powered Synthetic Engineers to Microsoft Fabric, enabling industrial teams to analyze P&IDs, query plant data, and get expert insights.

**You can:**

• Chat with PAM, your Plant AI Manager, for instant answers
• Analyze P&ID diagrams and equipment connections
• Query real-time telemetry from Eventhouse
• Get grounded responses with source citations
Workload_Hub_GetStarted_1_Description: Start chatting with PAM to explore your plant data
HelloWorldItem_Description: A Hello World Item to start your Dev Experience
